alert.note: Alert for Bennett (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:13AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Bennett County through 200 AM MDT... At 113 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lacreek Wildlife Refuge to 7 miles south of Sunrise Housing. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lacreek Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
